name: sample_query
query: _index=forge (sourceName or sourceCategory) *docker*  !0000000000131661 | parse "customer: '*'" as orgid nodrop | parse regex "\{\"_sourceName\":(?<jsonmap1>.+)\}$" nodrop  | parse regex "\{\"_sourceCategory\":(?<jsonmap2>.+)\}$" nodrop | where (jsonMap1!="" or jsonmap2!="") | if (jsonMap1 ="", jsonmap2, jsonmap1) as jsonMap| parse regex field=jsonmap "\"(?<data>[^\"]*docker[^\"]*)\":\{" multi | where data matches "*docker*" | "docker" as technology | count as count by technology , deployment, orgid, data | "logpath" as data_source | lookup org_name, type as org_type from shared/lookups/master_orgs on orgid=org_id, deployment=deployment
